unmute.user: The user who needs to remove restrictions

warn.cmd: Issue a warning to the user
warn.user: The user who needs to issue a warning

unwarn.cmd: Remove ALL warnings from the user
unwarn.user: The user who needs to remove the warnings

mute.success:
Пользователь ${target} был отстранён на ${time} минут(ы).
Причина: ${reason}

Администратор ${admin} отстранил пользователя ${target} на ${time} минут(ы).
Причина: ${reason}

unmute.logs: Администратор ${admin} снял с пользователя ${target} ограничение на общение

warn.0:
User ${target} received a his first warning.
Reason: ${reason}
warn.3:
User ${target} received a warning and was suspended for ${time} minuts.
Reason: ${reason}

unwarn.success: All warnings have been removed from the user ${target}
unwarn.logs: Администратор ${admin} снял с пользователя ${target} все предупреждения
